ValidationRule.description: If "Public Open RFP or Invitation to Bid?" is Yes, then "Provide URL Open RFP/Invitation to Bid" field must be specified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( Provide_URL_Open_RFP_Invitation_to_Bid__c ="", ISPICKVAL( Public_Open_RFP_or_Invitation_to_Bid__c , "Yes") ) , TRUE, FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Public Open RFP or Invitation to Bid = Yes, please specify.
